name: Megan
description:
I made this game a pretty long time ago, back when I was into game development. However, I never really got good at it, so the game is just an amateur-level thing. There might be bugs, it probably looks bad and stuff, but I hope you do still enjoy the game.

It is really just a typical horror story where a person lives on their own in a big house in the woods and weird stuff starts happening.
